title: Salvadoran teen is making bands teaching about Bitcoin
description: At the tender age of 18, Salvadoran native Gerardo Moran has established himself as a beacon of financial literacy in his home country, following his education in the government-backed Bitcoin diploma program, Mi Primer Bitcoin or My First Bitcoin. title: Yellen: China remains unharmed by US controls
description: Despite a tumultuous bilateral relationship fraught with multiple challenges, the United States maintains its commitment to the Chinese market. title: The game-changing impact of AI on online ads

title: Monero, Dash, and Zcash Gaining Traction as Bitcoin Shifts Focus Away from Privacy
description: KuCoin CEO said that the most important feature of Bitcoin is a unit of exchange and not privacy.
